game.name: Kuromaku
game.categories: Single-player, Captions available, Custom Volume Controls, Narrated Game Menus, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Kuromaku | 黒幕 Is An Indie First-Person Psychological Thriller Experienced From A Child’s Perspective. Complete Chores Assigned By Your Mother, Uncover Hidden Secrets, And Survive Unsettling Encounters. Objectives Must Be Completed To Progress Further Into The Rich, Unfolding Story.

Complete Chores Assigned By Your Mother, Uncover Hidden Secrets, And Survive Unsettling Encounters. Objectives Must Be Completed To Progress Further Into The Rich, Unfolding Story.
